questions.question_text:
Refer to the exhibit.
//IMG//

A collaboration engineer has integrated Cisco Unity Express with Cisco Unified Communications Manager Express and is experimenting with the MWI feature.
With the current configuration, no MWI change occurs when leaving new messages or after playing new messages. Which two changes are needed to correct the configuration? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: The answer is C and F
The documentation states "You cannot use unsolicited-notify mechanism along with any other mechanism at the same time" so it cannot be A B D, then what are the correct choises :/

answer is B-D
mwi-server ipv4:172.16.1.253 expires 3600 port 5060 transport udp is a correct config
in the unity express need envelop-info and sub-notify added
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/unified-communications/unity-express/211258-Configure-and-Troubleshoot-CUE-MWI-Mecha.html#anc9

comments.content: Answer "mwi-server ipv4:172.16.1.253 expires 3600 port 5060 transport udp" is right, but itÂ´s none of them....

discussion.content: Outcall and unsolicited cannot be configured at the same time. D,E would seem to be correct.

choices.A: ccn subsystem sip mwi sip outcall
choices.E: sip-ua no mwi-server mwi-server ipv4:172.16.1.253 expires 3600 port 5060 transport tcp notify
choices.C: sip-ua no mwi-server mwi-server ipv4:172.16.1.254 expires 3600 port 5060 transport udp
choices.F: sip-ua no mwi-server mwi-server ipv4:172.16.1.253 expires 3600 port 5060 transport udp unsolicited

discussion.content: The documentation says Restart but the service is not under network services so D should be fine

choices.B: Restart Cisco XCP Message Archiver in Cisco Unified Serviceability > Tools > Control Center "" Feature Services.
choices.C: Restart XCP Text Conference Manager in Cisco Unified Serviceability > Tools > Control Center "" Network Services.
choices.D: Activate XCP Text Conference Manager in Cisco Unified Serviceability > Tools > Service Activation.
choices.A: Activate Cisco XCP Connection Manager in Cisco Unified Serviceability > Tools > Service Activation.

questions.question_text:
Refer to the exhibit.
//IMG//

Users report that they cannot see the Chat Rooms icon on their Cisco Jabber clients. This feature works without issue in the lab. An engineer reviews the Cisco
IM&P and Jabber configuration and finds that the jabber-config.xml file is configured properly to support this feature. Which activity should be performed on the
IM&P server to resolve this issue?
What prevents toll fraud on voicemail ports?

choices.C: Block OffNet to OffNet Transfer service parameter
choices.A: IP address trusted list on the PSTN gateway

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
If the integration between CUCM and CUC is Skinny Call Control Protocol (SCCP) - The Voicemail Port's Calling Search Space (CSS) must have the partition of the Route Pattern (RP) to the Public Switched Telephone Network (PSTN) number.

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/unified-communications/unity-connection/119337-technote-cuc-00.html

questions.question_text: Which statement describes a role of AXL communications in the BLF Plug-in Service of the Cisco Unified Attendant Console?

discussion.content: Answer is B "Part of the Cisco Unified Attendant Console Advanced BLF Plug-in service known as Device Resolution Manager (DRM) uses AXL to communicate with Cisco Unified Communications Manager. The AXL communications enable DRM to resolve the BLFs of operator and system devices, and to synchronize system devices within the Cisco Unified Communications Manager database."

Selected Answer: B
should B be
B. The AXL communications enable Device Resolution Manager to resolve the device statuses of operator and system devices.

choices.B: The AXL communications enable Device Resolution Manager to resolve the device statuses of operator and system devices.
choices.A: The AXL communications allow registered attendants to log in to Cisco Unified Communications Manager and receive calls.
choices.D: The AXL communications is required after installation to verify that the specified CTI manager or managers and Cisco Unified CM versions.
choices.C: The AXL communications is required after installation to verify that the specified CTI manager or managers and Cisco Unified Attendant Console versions match.

questions.question_text: Which type of SRV record provides the location of Cisco Expressway-E?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/jabber/Windows/9_7/CJAB_BK_C606D8A9_00_cisco-jabber-dns-configuration-guide/CJAB_BK_C606D8A9_00_cisco-jabber-dns-configuration-guide_chapter_010.html
_collab-edge 
Provides the location of the Cisco VCS Expressway or Cisco Expressway-E server.
